data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Phengsi, Natthaporn, Jaitrong, Weeyawat, Ruangsittichai, Jiraporn, Salinee Khachonpisitsak, (2018): A sibling species of Platythyreaclypeata Forel, 1911 in southeast Asia (Hymenoptera, Formicidae, Ponerinae). ZooKeys 729: 87-102, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.729.21378, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.729.21378
